responses: Hello! How can I help you?
Hey, what can I assist you with?
You're welcome. How else can I assist you?
I'm just a computer program, so I don't have an age.
I don't have an age. I'm here to help you!
I don't have a name. You can call me Chatbot.
I go by Chatbot. How can I assist you today?
Of course! I'm here to help. What do you need assistance with?
I'd be happy to help. What's your question?
I'm sorry, I didn't quite catch that. Could you please rephrase your question?
I'm not sure I understand. Can you rephrase that?
I didn't get that. Can you try again?
